title: Covered Censor
description: Globular box, carved green jade, with cover.  globular form with two undercut handles in the form of peony stems which are circled with loose rings.  three ball feet, each grasped by the head and claws of an ogre.  The cover is surmounted by lionine Shi Tsu.  Bluish green jade sometimes called sapphire jade.  \'Green jadeite\'
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Augustus L. Searle
